item.description:
Have you ever wondered about the process that goes into making your favorite beer?
Well, come down and learn more and sample various beers in the process.

We will are doing this tour in the afternoon (actual tour is from 3-5pm), so that we can go out for a bite to eat or continue the party elsewhere...for good food and drink!


Please join us. We will be touring with our friends from Fairfield County Beer Lovers and also Shoot The Bull.



Site:
http://www.newengland....
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri, Marianne or Ed
item.name: New England Brewing Co. - Brewery Tour
